title: Problem-Based Blended Learning Program for Evidence-Based Decision-Making Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Medical Terminology and Research Methodologies, and Fundamental Data Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Modular design and asynchronous collaboration tools to ensure scheduling flexibility for office/administrative workers

learning_goals: Learners can systematically construct evidence-based questions by applying the PICO framework in real clinical scenarios.
Learners can critically evaluate meta-analysis research findings and determine their clinical applicability.
Learners can design a decision tree that integrates patient values and preferences in the evidence-based decision-making process.

resources: LMS Platform (Discussion Board, Assignment Submission System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
